column2: Select an answer for if {0} owed any debts to anyone outside of the UK
column3: Dewiswch ateb ar gyfer a oedd ar {0} ddyledion i unrhyw un y tu allan i'r DU

column2: Select an answer for if there are any debts from a trust that {0} benefitted from
column3: Dewiswch ateb ar gyfer a oes unrhyw ddyledion o ymddiriedolaeth y bu {0} yn elwa ohoni

column3: Dyledion sy'n ddyledus o ymddiriedolaeth

column3: Swm unrhyw ddyledion sy'n ddyledus o ymddiriedolaeth

column3: Treuliau angladd

column2: Value of the funeral expenses
column3: Swm y treuliau angladd

column2: Value of debts
column3: Swm y dyledion

column2: Foreign debts
column3: Dyledion tramor

column2: This is the value of all debts owed to anyone outside of the UK including anything owed on any foreign assets.
column3: Dyma swm yr holl ddyledion sy'n ddyledus i unrhyw un y tu allan i'r DU, gan gynnwys unrhyw beth sy'n ddyledus ar asedion tramor.

column2: You must change the foreign value to British pounds using the exchange rate on the date of death.
column3: Mae'n rhaid i chi newid y swm tramor i bunnoedd Prydeinig, gan ddefnyddio'r gyfradd gyfnewid ar ddyddiad y farwolaeth.

column2: Are there any debts being paid out of the estate that are owed to anyone outside of the UK?
column3: A oes unrhyw ddyledion sy'n cael eu talu allan o'r ystâd yn ddyledus i unrhyw un y tu allan i'r DU?

column2: Debts owed from trust
column3: Dyledion sy'n ddyledus o ymddiriedolaeth

column2: This is the value of any debts owed from a trust that {0} was benefitting from. If the trustees only gave you the value of a trust after deducting any debts then do not include a value here.
column3: Dyma swm unrhyw ddyledion sy'n ddyledus o ymddiriedolaeth yr oedd {0} yn elwa ohoni. Os oedd yr ymddiriedolwyr ond wedi rhoi swm ymddiriedolaeth ar ôl didynnu unrhyw ddyledion, peidiwch â chynnwys swm fan hyn.

column2: Are there any debts being paid out of the estate that are owed from a trust that {0} benefitted from?
column3: A oes unrhyw ddyledion sy'n cael eu talu allan o'r ystâd sy'n ddyledus o ymddiriedolaeth yr oedd {0} yn elwa ohoni?

column2: You can deduct some funeral expenses. Things that could be claimed as an expense are flowers, refreshments for mourners and any necessary expenses to cover the funeral arrangements and the cost of a headstone or plaque to mark the grave. This will come out of the estate as a debt.
column3: Gallwch ddidynnu rhai treuliau angladd. Pethau a allai gael eu hawlio fel traul yw blodau, lluniaeth ar gyfer galarwyr, ac unrhyw dreuliau angenrheidiol i dalu am drefniadau'r angladd a chost carreg fedd neu blac i nodi'r bedd. Daw hwn allan o'r ystâd fel dyled.

column2: If {0} paid for a funeral plan before they died, this would not be a funeral expense. Any travelling or accommodation costs for mourners, or any flowers or refreshments that they gave, cannot be claimed as a funeral expense.
column3: Os talodd {0} am gynllun angladd cyn iddo/iddi farw, ni fyddai hwn yn draul angladd. Ni ellir hawlio costau teithio na chostau llety ar gyfer galarwyr, nac ychwaith unrhyw flodau neu luniaeth a roddwyd ganddynt, fel traul angladd.

column2: Are there any funeral expenses being paid out of the estate?
column3: A oes treuliau angladd yn cael eu talu allan o'r ystâd?

column2: Other debts
column3: Dyledion eraill

column2: This is the total value of any other debts that are being paid from the estate that are not included in any other section.
column3: Dyma gyfanswm unrhyw ddyledion eraill sy'n cael eu talu o'r ystâd sydd heb eu cynnwys mewn adran arall.

column2: This includes any loans {0} was paying, including those they were guaranteeing and had been asked to pay when they died.
column3: Mae hwn yn cynnwys unrhyw fenthyciadau yr oedd {0} yn eu talu, gan gynnwys y rheiny a sicrhawyd ganddo/ganddi ac y gofynnwyd iddo/iddi eu talu pan fu farw.

column2: Any outstanding credit card debts and money owed on any insurance policies and household bills are included here.
column3: Caiff unrhyw ddyledion cardiau credyd sydd i'w talu, ac arian sy'n ddyledus ar bolisïau yswiriant a biliau'r cartref, eu cynnwys fan hyn.

column2: Value of any other debts
column3: Swm unrhyw ddyledion eraill

column2: Are there any other debts to be paid out of the estate?
column3: A oes unrhyw ddyledion eraill i'w talu allan o'r ystâd?

column2: Give more details about debts owed from a trust
column3: Rhowch ragor o fanylion am ddyledion sy'n ddyledus o ymddiriedolaeth

column2: Give a value for debts owed from a trust
column3: Rhowch swm ar gyfer dyledion sy'n ddyledus o ymddiriedolaeth

column2: Change the value of debts owed from a trust
column3: Newidiwch swm y dyledion sy'n ddyledus o ymddiriedolaeth

column2: You have not given a value for debts owed from a trust
column3: Nid ydych wedi rhoi swm ar gyfer dyledion sy'n ddyledus o ymddiriedolaeth

column2: The value of debts owed from a trust is £{0}
column3: £{0} yw swm y dyledion sy'n ddyledus o ymddiriedolaeth

column3: £{0} yw swm y dyledion sy'n ddyledus i unrhyw un y tu allan i'r DU

column3: £{0} yw cyfanswm y dyledion sy'n ddyledus o'r ystâd

column2: Total value of debts owed from the estate
column3: Cyfanswm y dyledion sy'n ddyledus o'r ystâd

column2: A debt is anything that {0} was responsible for paying. Only include debts that are being paid out of {1}’s estate.
column3: Dyled yw unrhyw beth yr oedd {0} yn gyfrifol am ei dalu. Dylech ond gynnwys dyledion sy'n cael eu talu allan o ystâd {1}.

column2: You need a grant of representation from the Probate Service to pay some debts off from the estate and sometimes the value of debts owed can be taken off the total estate value.
column3: Mae angen grant cynrychiolaeth arnoch oddi wrth y Gwasanaeth Profiant i dalu rhai dyledion o'r ystâd. Weithiau, gall swm y dyledion gael eu didynnu o gyfanswm gwerth yr ystâd.

column2: A debt is anything that {0} was responsible for paying. Only include debts that are being paid out of {1}’s estate. You need a grant of representation from the Probate Service to pay some debts off from the estate and sometimes the value of debts owed can be taken off the total estate value.
column3: Dyled yw unrhyw beth yr oedd {0} yn gyfrifol am ei dalu. Dylech ond gynnwys dyledion sy'n cael eu talu allan o ystâd {1}. Mae angen grant cynrychiolaeth arnoch oddi wrth y Gwasanaeth Profiant i dalu rhai dyledion o'r ystâd. Weithiau, gall swm y dyledion gael eu didynnu o gyfanswm gwerth yr ystâd.

column2: Debt
column3: Dyled
